results.title: History of Pasta
results.snippet: Greek Mythology. Greek mythology suggests that the Greek god Vulcan invented a device that made strings of dough – the first spaghetti!

results.title: Pasta
results.snippet: Evidence of Etruscans making pasta dates back to 400 BCE. The first concrete information on pasta products in Italy dates to the 13th or 14th centuries.

results.title: History Of Pasta: Wheat + Water + Patience
results.snippet: According to history, however, pasta's earliest roots begin in China, during the Shang Dynasty (1700-1100 BC), where some form of pasta was made with either ...
